text: This is one of my favourite songs of all time. And I haven't touched the Sonic Series since the Genesis.
author: Vaseem Baig

text:
I'm JUST now realizing you have nothing from Sonic Heroes. 

To be specific I'm talking about Ocean Palace.
Also, I know it's just your opinion an' all, but I thought for sure you'd have the day version- and more from unleashed in general. The Tornado Defence stage is pretty good too. Everything from Apotos is great. 

Like, better than this great. Wow I sound terrible
author: 2many2Dside

text: Ocean Palace would be great. I'm also partial to Seaside Hill and Grand Metropolis. I played way too much Sonic Heroes growing up.
author: Joshua Fagan

text: I would include What I'm Made Of, Egg Fleet and Final Fortress
author: redgyrados2000

text:
It always bugged me how drastically different the PS2/Wii versions were from the PS3/360 versions. So the opinions people have about this game, that have only played one of the versions, are so drastically different. 
I've only played the Wii version, and I enjoyed it. Though I hear the 360 version had better daytime stages.
author: Rocket Ken

text: I love how the cello is the main star of this track. Not that I have a problem with the violin or piano taking the spotlight. Heavens no. But I love hearing the cello because I don't hear it enough.
author: SanRok

text:
Hmmmm...
this song makes me kinda want to buy this game.
author: Piss dog

text: Sonic Unleashed has such an amazing soundtrack. Probably my favorite Sonic OST. All around I love it.
author: Alon Jacovi

text: It's hard to look through all the videos, but I hope you have discovered the soundtrack of Final Fantasy XI to be worth your time. Amazing stuff, one of the best soundtracks out of the entire FF series.
author: Steve Sublime

text: I don't usually pair classical and goofy looking blue critter.
author: prufenful

text: I so freakin love Adabat, and I love Sonic Unleashed, Adabat is so beautiful and both day and night music tracks for both town and stages are great for me, I sooo want to live there!!

text: Parts of this sound like the theme from Merry Christmas Mr. Lawrence...or is it just me?

text: Unleashed's soundtrack was just superb. And the daytime levels were really fun.

text: Wasn't expecting such a masterpiece! Wow!
author: Phenom Uprising

text: If there's one good thing that can be said about the majority of modern Sonic games, it's that they have great soundtracks. Even Sonic 06 had a good soundtrack.

text: ~especially~ sonic 06 :D

text: It was the ONLY good thing about Sonic 06, that made it somewhat tolerable.
author: Jirt

text: YES!!!
author: Hannah

text:
One of my favourite tracks in this game, in one of my favourite soundtracks of this franchise.

I will admit, the more I look at Sonic Boom, the less excited I get for it. It does seem to be looking very bland, but I'll give the TV series and the game the benefit of the doubt when they come out. Despite the fact that the game looks like a very standard multiplayer beat 'em up.
author: Medal Melodies

text: this stage crawled straight out of hell itself... it was so fucking hard... i really liked that nintendo really created a difficult challenge
author: nonameispossible

text:
"Sonic Game"
"Nintendo"

Lol you fucking with me right.
author: lacoot

text: Last Sonic game I played has Sonic the Hedgehog for the PS3, it was cool but a little bit unstable with lots of bad gameplay mechanics but I enjoyed. Sonic Unleashed was cool I remembered it when I played it for the PS2. Sonic Boom for me looks cool though I'll need to see more gameplay, I just can't seem to find a Sonic game that attracts me anymore =/. Music is top notch as always with themes like this and Crush 40 with theme songs ;D.
author: LightyGab

text: Congrats on surviving 06! And you enjoyed it? Dang, you must be a lot more patient (and positive) than the rest of the fanbase! XD
author: Hannah

text: @Hannah G Haha yeah I think so, but as I said it was painful to play. I think I kept going cause I did not have anything to play or something like that.
author: LightyGab

text: Great to see someone else enjoyed Sonic 06, I got it for the 360 and my expectations were astronomically high, but I was like "meh, it's not that bad" and I liked Silver a lot, but those eternal loadscreens made me crazy, maybe I was a blind fanboy or I was just crazy to play some new Sonic at that time, then after that, Sonic Unleashed was a really pleasant surprise, one of the best Sonics I ever played
author: Xero Solar

text: @Xero Solar Exact same feeling I had, I wanted to play a Sonic game like Adventures or something like that and 06 "looked" like the best option at the moment. Unleashed was a great surprise too, with the wolf and all. I just hope we get to see a great Sonic game again in the future. Sonic Boom looks ok to me but I need to see more...
author: LightyGab

text:
YES
MORE UNLEASHED MUSIC
author: Erin Lux

text: Sonic Unleashed sure had an awesome soundtrack. Have you guys seen Sonic Boom? It looks like an absolutely terrible entry for an already unstable franchise. It's very hard to be optimistic about it. Just check out what Knuckles looks like, I first thought it was a bad joke. Hopefully the music will be as solid as ever since that's one of the few constantly positive things this franchise has going.
author: SupraDarky

text:
Not quite sure if it counts, but Amanita Design, the developers of Mechanarium have already released a similar game. It's called Botanicula, and similarly it has an amazing soundtrack!
http://amanita-design.net/games/botanicula.html
